title: Killing Abyssal Spider (Part 3)
body:
Killing Abyssal Spider (Part 3)

Evan was stunned for a moment when he realized he lost his connection with Mirage Wyvern. But he quickly came back to his senses because he knew it wasn't time to think about anything else.

'Kazil, take care of the Abyssal Spider' Evan used shadow senses and ordered Kazil to take care of Abyssal Spider for the time being.

The number of spiders in the surroundings was increasing with each passing second. Although his shadow undeads were killing thousands of spiders, the spiders kept coming out from the underground without stopping.

Suddenly Evan noticed a red aura appeared around all the spiders. A1 used its sharp claw which was covered in lightning to tear apart a B rank spider, but Evan was shocked because A1's attack only left a small claw mark on the body of the spider without harming it.

When Evan looked around, he noticed similar things were happening everywhere and even after taking attacks of his shadow undeads head-on, all the soldiers were fine.
